    • Method Detail

      • setPsk

        public IpsecSite.Builder setPsk(java.lang.String psk)
        Pre Shared Key for the IPsec Site. Required if Site peerIp is not 'any'. Global PSK is used when Authentication mode is PSK and Site peerIp is 'any'.
        Parameters:
        psk - New value for the property.

      • setLocalId

        public IpsecSite.Builder setLocalId(java.lang.String localId)
        Local ID of the IPsec Site. Defaults to the local IP.
        Parameters:
        localId - New value for the property.

      • setEnablePfs

        public IpsecSite.Builder setEnablePfs(java.lang.Boolean enablePfs)
        Enable/disable Perfect Forward Secrecy. Default is true.
        Parameters:
        enablePfs - New value for the property.

      • setAuthenticationMode

        public IpsecSite.Builder setAuthenticationMode(java.lang.String authenticationMode)
        Authentication mode for the IPsec Site. Valid values are psk and x.509, with psk as default.
        Parameters:
        authenticationMode - New value for the property.

      • setPeerSubnets

        public IpsecSite.Builder setPeerSubnets(Subnets peerSubnets)
        Peer subnets for which IPsec VPN is configured.
        Parameters:
        peerSubnets - New value for the property.

      • setDhGroup

        public IpsecSite.Builder setDhGroup(java.lang.String dhGroup)
        Diffie-Hellman algorithm group. Defaults to DH14 for FIPS enabled NSX Edge. DH2 and DH5 are not supported when FIPS is enabled on NSX Edge. Valid values are DH2, DH5, DH14, DH15, DH16.
        Parameters:
        dhGroup - New value for the property.

      • setSiteId

        public IpsecSite.Builder setSiteId(java.lang.String siteId)
        ID of the IPsec Site configuration provided by NSX Manager.
        Parameters:
        siteId - New value for the property.

      • setDescription

        public IpsecSite.Builder setDescription(java.lang.String description)
        Description of the IPsec Site.
        Parameters:
        description - New value for the property.

      • setPeerIp

        public IpsecSite.Builder setPeerIp(java.lang.String peerIp)
        IP (IPv4) address or FQDN of the Peer. Can also be specified as 'any'. Required.
        Parameters:
        peerIp - New value for the property.

      • setName

        public IpsecSite.Builder setName(java.lang.String name)
        Name of the IPsec Site.
        Parameters:
        name - New value for the property.

      • setCertificate

        public IpsecSite.Builder setCertificate(java.lang.String certificate)
        Parameters:
        certificate - New value for the property.

      • setLocalIp

        public IpsecSite.Builder setLocalIp(java.lang.String localIp)
        Local IP of the IPsec Site. Should be one of the IP addresses configured on the uplink interfaces of the NSX Edge. Required.
        Parameters:
        localIp - New value for the property.

      • setEncryptionAlgorithm

        public IpsecSite.Builder setEncryptionAlgorithm(java.lang.String encryptionAlgorithm)
        IPsec encryption algorithm with default as aes256. Valid values are 'aes', 'aes256', '3des', 'aes-gcm'.
        Parameters:
        encryptionAlgorithm - New value for the property.

      • setEnabled

        public IpsecSite.Builder setEnabled(java.lang.Boolean enabled)
        Enable/disable IPsec Site.
        Parameters:
        enabled - New value for the property.

      • setMtu

        public IpsecSite.Builder setMtu(java.lang.Long mtu)
        MTU for the IPsec site. Defaults to the mtu of the NSX Edge vnic specified by the localIp. Optional. format: int32
        Parameters:
        mtu - New value for the property.

      • setExtension

        public IpsecSite.Builder setExtension(java.lang.String extension)
        Parameters:
        extension - New value for the property.

      • setPeerId

        public IpsecSite.Builder setPeerId(java.lang.String peerId)
        Peer ID. Should be unique for all IPsec Site's configured for an NSX Edge.
        Parameters:
        peerId - New value for the property.

      • setLocalSubnets

        public IpsecSite.Builder setLocalSubnets(Subnets localSubnets)
        Local subnets for which IPsec VPN is configured.
        Parameters:
        localSubnets - New value for the property.
